div.h2: Welcome to the Peshtigo School District

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: The Peshtigo School District is proud of the learning opportunities it provides for all students as they strive to reach their personal and career goals. Our student success begins by providing your child and family with a safe and nurturing environment that promotes academic and social growth. All of our staff is here to serve our students while partnering with families and the community to continue the tradition of excellence at Peshtigo School District.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Please feel free to contact me anytime by calling (715) 582-3677 ext. 1010, by email

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: , or by visiting the district office.
